parameters.name: CheckGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of a device group. The InSpecifiedGroup response parameter indicates whether the devices belong to the specified group.

parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description: The keyword in the DeviceName of the device whose information you want to query. Fuzzy match is supported.

parameters.name: IotInstanceId
parameters.description:
The instance ID. You can view the **ID** of the instance on the **Overview** page in the IoT Platform console.

>  You must specify this parameter for a public instance of the new version or an Enterprise Edition instance. You do not need to specify this parameter for a public instance of the previous version.

For more information, see the [Overview](~~356505~~) topic of IoT instances.

parameters.name: LicenseStatusList
parameters.description:
The license status.

*   **NORMAL**: The license is valid.
*   **EXPIRE**: The license is expired.
*   **EXPIRING**: The license is about to expire.

parameters.name: PageId
parameters.description: The page number. Valid values: 1 to 10000.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Valid values: 1 to 50. Default value: 20.

parameters.name: ProductKey
parameters.description: The **ProductKey** of the product to which the devices belong.
